author: Chris Mills Rodrigo
title: Twitter comes under fire over Chinese disinformation on coronavirus
description: Twitter is being pulled into the middle of a fight between the Trump administration and China over the coronavirus.Republican lawmakers and Trump allie...
content:
Twitter is being pulled into the middle of a fight between the Trump administration and China over the coronavirus.
Republican lawmakers and Trump allies have been stepping up pressure on the social media platform to crack down on disinformation from Chinese… [+6759 chars]
